exec: // Pass the response body parsed as JSON as `data`

item.name: Get Jobs by Process Instance Id

body.raw:
{
    "operationName": "getJobsByProcessInstanceId",
    "variables": {
        "processInstanceId": "{{process-instance-id}}"
    },
    "query": "query getJobsByProcessInstanceId($processInstanceId: String) {
  Jobs(where: {processInstanceId: {equal: $processInstanceId}}) {
    id
    processId
    processInstanceId
    rootProcessId
    status
    expirationTime
    priority
    callbackEndpoint
    repeatInterval
    repeatLimit
    scheduledId
    retries
    lastUpdate
    endpoint
    nodeInstanceId
    executionCounter
    __typename
  }
}
"
}

item.name: Get user tasks by process instance id
